Items.Name: Biometric Door
Items.Options:
Stop and gain 3Tags
OR
Stop and you lose 2[^Time]

Items.Name: Kill Drones
Items.Options:
Take Damage equal to your Tags
OR
Stop and take 2Damage

Items.Name: Invasive AI
Items.Options:
Gain 2Tags and all your Tinker devices are disabled
OR
Gain 2Tags and Lose 3[^Time]

Items.Name: Explosive Room
Items.Options:
Take 7Damage and destroy this obstacle
OR
Lose 2[^Time] and gain 2Tag and destroy this obstacle

Items.Name: Corrupt Door Guard
Items.Options:
Pay 6[^Money]
OR
Stop, take 1Damage and gain 1Tag

Items.Name: Time Locked Door
Items.Options:
If you arrived at an hour divisble by 6 no effect
OR
Lose [^Time] until it's an hour divisible by 6 and take damage equal to your Tags

Items.Name: Routine Patrol
Items.Options:
Stop and Take 3Damage
Or
Lose 6[^Time] minus the number of times you have snuck by them before

Items.Name: Toxin Room
Items.Options:
Take 1Damage now and each time 1[^Time] passes
OR
Stop

Items.Name: Laser Room
Items.Options:
Lose 1[^Time] and take 9Damage minus the number of times you have dodged these lasers before
OR
Take 9Damage

Items.Name: Secret Door
Items.Options:
Stop
OR
If you have ever bypassed this obstacle before, bypass this obstacle

Items.Name: Sharpshooter
Items.Options:
If you have 0Tags, No Effect
OR
Take 9Damage
